titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of January 23, 2018, as "National Handwriting Day" and recognizing the importance of handwriting for cognitive, artistic, and educational benefit.
Expressing support for the designation of January 23, 2018, as "National Handwriting Day" and recognizing the importance of handwriting for cognitive, artistic, and educational benefit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of National Handwriting Day, and recognizes the importance of handwriting in cognitive, artistic, and educational development.
